documents.document:
Nike Dunk High Women White Team Orange-matte Slive

Nike Dunks releases a new pair shoes-Nike Dunk Women High. The Nike Dunk Women shoes sport a combination of mesh and leather along the upper, along with a vibrant design consisting of team orange and white hues. Finishing off the Nike Dunk Orange-matte are matte silver shoe laces, as well as a classic gum-rubber outsole.This Nike Dunk High Women White Team Orange-matte Sliver also proof that women’s sneakers are becoming a priority for designers.If you like the Nike Orange-matte,you can get it in a dunk-shop online.

Nike Kids Dunk SB Skate or Die Edition black neon yellow

This is a sample of the Nike Dunk SB Low Skate Or Die Edition. The Nike Dunk High Pro SB – Skate or Die (Black / Neon Yellow) derives its inspiration and colors from the 1987 Skate or Die video game artwork. The game featured two ramp events, the freestyle ramp and the high jump, two downhill events, the downhill race (in a park setting) and the downhill jam (in a street setting), and the pool joust.
The color listed on the tag is Black / Neon Yellow. It does come with 2 pairs of laces, the blue and neon yellow. Nike Dunk Skate or Die Edition is part of the Nike Dunk SB Spring 2008 lineup. They are modeled after the 87’s or 88’s video game Skate Or Die as you can see from the picture. The colors and confetti patterns are on the back and sides. Nike Kids Skate or Die Edition was one of the most desired SB’s of 2008.

Nike Dunks White Electric Green Blue

The latest of the Nike Dunk High with branded Zoom is the white, sea green, and blue colorway. The colorway itself might seem familiar, as it was seen on a Nike Air Max 90 from 2006 that was unfortunately overshadowed by the re-release of the Infrared Air Max 90.

From wild and crazy to elegant and subtle, the Nike Dunk works in so many ways. For us personally it’s more so the subtle and simple designs which get us going and help us complete the perfect fit, which is exactly what this two-tone Nike Dunk High looks to do. Full grain leather and pebbled leather in pure White construct the entire upper while the White Electric Green Nike Swoosh is fabricated from patent leather. Further use of Electric Green is used on the nylon tongue and on the midsole stitching. Looking somewhat out of place in my opinion is a pair of White Electric Green Blue laces, which as you know can easily be swapped for a color of your choice.

Nike Dunk High Premium Black Vandal Inspired

There have been quite a few Nike Dunks with the all nylon upper lately, but there has definitely been a little more love for the ladies than for men’s sizes with this material. Now, guys will finally have their chance to cop a nice pair of kicks with this updated, high-end nylon material, which will definitely add a different edge to your collection. Black Vandal Inspired Dunk is an all Black Nike Dunk High inspired by the Nike Vandal, with an all nylon upper that is somewhat reflective and absolutely clean. Nike Dunk Black Vandal Inspired might even be a nice fit for some formal occasions where a black shoe is required.

Nike Dunk High Women White Team Orange-matte Sliver

Nike Dunks releases a new pair shoes-Nike White Orange-matte. The Orange-matte Dunks sport a combination of mesh and leather along the upper, along with a vibrant design consisting of team orange and white hues. Finishing off the Nike Orange-matte shoes are matte silver shoe laces, as well as a classic gum-rubber outsole.Continuing proof that women’s sneakers are becoming a priority for designers.

Nike Womens Dunk High multicolored Red Pink Gold

Nike Womens Dunk High Premium – Red – Pink – Gold

Just when you think the Nike Dunk can’t get any funkier, this multicolored head turner pops up and reminds us how endless the possibilities really are. Boasting six different colors, not even counting the white and grey, this Nike multicolored Red Pink Gold will be sure to draw attention wherever they go. Rave pink, varsity red, bright yellow, aqua and grass green each command a different section of the the leather upper, but its the metallic orange heel panel that really makes this shoe stand out with a beautiful shimmer that falls somewhere between gold and copper. Granted, the outrageous appearance of this Dunk multicolored Red Pink Gold is distracting, but don’t overlook the fact that this Dunk Red Pink Gold model features a Zoom sole and is built for maximum comfort.

Nike SB Dunk Low Red Royal Blue White

This pair Nike Sb Red Blue sports some interesting color blocking with Red suede and leather covering most of the upper. Accents come by way of some Blue mesh on the tongue and around the ankle and splashes of White on the toe box, tongue, heel tab and midsole. Like the Dark Chocolate/Metallic Silver pair seen yesterday, these will also be without padding in the tongue, but a nice color scheme and combination of materials should be more than enough for many Nike SB fans.

Nike Dunk Low SB is starting off strong this Spring 2010 with new, interesting and unique colorways. In addition to their collection, check out this new Nike Dunk Red Blue that comes in a Red, Royal Bue and White colorway. It features a toeguard and rear panel made of suede and its center and toe made of leather. The combination of suede, leather and a killer colorway is what makes this shoe a ?must buy?. If you?re planning to reserve a pair Red Blue Dunks, its style number is 304292-661.

Nike Dunk Big Bad Wolf by YoaKustoms Shoes

When i saw the detail put into these custom Nike Dunks by YoaKustoms i was blown away. YoaKustoms went with a design inspired by the face of a wolf, or a Big Bad Wolf in this case. The various shades of grey and black placed throughout the design to repersent the wolfs fur looks amazing and you can tell the color placement was well thought out before hand to give you an authentic look. The big red eyes defiantly pop out at you and the mean grin along the frontal showing off the teeth helps added to the whole Big Bad Wolf theme. Its the little things that make a big difference though on these Custom Nike Dunks. For example the ears which YoaKustoms added the back around the ankle. Did you catch that at first? Such a little feature which helps wrap things up in big way. Hit the jump to check more pictures of the custom Big Bad Wolf Nike Dunks and check out the detail and concentration that went into them.
The theme / inspiration is derived by the concept of the big bad wolf. The overall picture of the whole Big Bad Wolf Shoes developed is a very graphic representation of a face with bloodshot eyes, red wolf. You have a dull gray and black, like the contrast with red eyes. The really striking feature of the pair of wolf heard the creative design tab for the back of the heel of the Big Bad Wolf Nike Dunks. Be sure to note! Its outputs simply amazing Sing the YoaKustoms for a great creation.

Oil Painting Sunrise Custom Nike Dunk - Ocher Black

Oil Painting Sunrise Custom Nike Dunk - Ocher Black

These special Nike Dunk High were part of Custom Nike Dunk published in this month. With the sleek design, the shoes with a custom hang tag, box and bag retardancy are produced, the detail is perfect and the shading with some very special details.This Oil Painting Sunrise Custom Nike Dunk High is made perfect by design, many fans want them.

Nike Dunks are mostly acclimated by sports personalities all over the apple with varieties of Nike Douse models.The accepted Oil Painting Sunrise Custom Nike Dunk High models includes Nike Douse High, Custom Nike Douse and more.In conclusion, nike dunks can become your abutting friend. These appropriate Nike Douse High were a allotment of the Custom Nike Dunk appear this month. Forth with the bright design, the shoes are packaged with a custom hangtag, box and garmet bag,the account and the concealment is altogether done forth with some actual appropriate details.This Oil Painting Sunrise Nike Dunk Sunrise Shoes is absolute with its design,many douse admirers appetite to own them.Now,they are accessible in collect-shoes.com,get them now!

Cliff Huxtable Dunks Nike SB Dunk High Premium Wool

Cliff Huxtable Dunks Nike SB Dunk High Premium Wool

As I mentioned before, Nike Dunk SB is released a Dunk SB huxtable. The Cliff Huxtable Nike SB Dunk High is inspired by the Coogi sweaters that Bill Cosby, aka Cliff Huxtable, rocked on The Cosby Show. The Custom Nike Dunk SB huxtable colorway is based on the classic sweater design worn by Bill Cosby’s infamous character, Cliff Huxtable. One could also identify this sneaker with the Fresh Prince of Bel Air…this style was pretty popular in that show as well…who knows…The trademark multi-color sweater might just be making a comeback. Along with the sweater design, this sneaker features a black leather midsole and swoosh, but the crazy multi-color wool panels really make this sneaker pop. Go out and grab you a pair of these bad boys, and then run out to your local thrift store…I guarantee you will find at least 30 sweaters that will match these bad boys.

The Premium Nike dunk high Wool is inspired by Cliff Huxtable . The Cooji sweater itself was retroed but this Dr. Huxtable Dunk reminds you why dudes started wearing technicoloured dream-sweaters in the first place . If you want to learn more detailed information of the shoe , please follow me .

Talking to the design of this pair of shoes , the multiple upper is outstanding so that the Nike dunks high Premum Wool can attract most of people who show interest in the dunks shoe . The Nike Swoosh is created and the shoe upper is full of different colorways along with exaggerated yet sole . The outstanding feature makes the shoe trendy and personality . We believe the boy can be glad to wear such Nike dunks high Premium Wool to show your personality .

Nike Dunk High Womens Hello Kitty 3 Stizo Custom

Hello Kitty, is one of the best known of many simply drawn fictional characters produced by the Japanese company Sanrio. Designed by Ikuko Shimizu, the first product, a vinyl coin purse, was introduced in Japan in 1974, and in the United States in 1976. The rising importance of Hello Kitty in the United States in the last decade reflects the craze over the children’s brand in Asia since the 1970s. Hello Kitty fits into the 21st century American love affair with anime and simple art. One lucky sneaker fan commissioned a Hello Kitty inspired pair of Nike Dunks through Stizo Custom Kicks. The cartoon cat that has become ubiquitous throughout the world pops out of the heels of these Nike Womens Hello Kitty Custom. The blending of purple and pink hues from toe to heel is the most impressive aspect of these shoes. It is difficult to move without an interruption from a deep purple to a bright pink. This is young ladies’ favorite.

Are you excited for the upcoming holiday season? Let’s look at this Nike Dunk Hello Kitty, hello kitty is a popular brand around the world, it’s lovely image of lovely go deep into people’s heart. The Custom Hello Kitty Dunks main colour: red, blue. It is a solid rubber sole, the sole has engrave and logo for skid resistance. The blue leather NIKE logo at the vamp is a air hole shoes, it is a pink rope lace. The white stitching is also a nice touch to finish the shoe off . The Custom Nike Dunks is good material and handicraft. Street sport without limit. For all the female sneaker heads out there, what do you think? Buy nike dunk hello shoes now.

Nike Dunk Customs Honoring Roberto Clemente

Nike Dunk Customs Honoring Roberto Clemente

The black/yellow colorway used by Smooth Tip matches the uniform color of the Pittsburgh Pirates. The Pirates logo is placed on the left heel along with Clemente’s number 21. An amazing portrait of Clemente taken from one of his collector’s cards sits next to the player’s signature on the right heel. This Roberto Clement Nike Dunks is the perfect tribute to a player that was dedicated to the game and his community.

The boilerplate sneaker fan apparently apperceive little about the above Pittsburgh Pirate Nike Dunk Roberto Clemente, on his aboriginal afterlife in a even blast on New Year’s Eve 1972nd Clemente was an outfielder for the Pirates for his absolute career of 18 years and won the National League MVP in 1966. The best advantageous band of statistics including 3,000 visits, a hit amount of .317 and 240 home runs. This shows why Productions created a abbreviate adventures able association Council in the angel Nike Dunk High. The atramentous / chicken colorway is accurate with bendable Council with the acclimated compatible blush of the Pittsburgh Pirates. Roberto Shoes is placed on the larboard heel with Clemente’s cardinal 21. An absorbing account of Clement from a accumulating of cards sitting abutting to the signature of the amateur taken in the appropriate heel. This Honoring Roberto Clement Dunks is the absolute accolade to a amateur that was committed to the bold and his community.

Nike Dunk High Do The Dew Green Label Art Event

Nike Dunk High Do The Dew Green Label Art Event

Nike Dunk High Do The Dew Green Label Art Event DK-247(Style # 301852-043),Mountain Dew "Green Label Art" where famous artists got the chance to infuse art into the citrus beverage. Some of the names on the list of artists include jeffstaple, Methamphibian, Haze, and our good friend from Houston, Dez.Mountain Dew and Seed Gives Life is putting on a special event to celebrate Dezs work. For the special event, Dez put together a pair of "Dew The Dew" Custom Nike Dunks that match the bottle.Belong to "Do the Dew" Series,now our shop have 5 fashion colorway:Navy DK-245, Grape DK-244 , Varsity Red DK-246, Grape DK-244.

Nike Dunks Do The Dew are so fresh and so clean. Artist Dez created these Nike Dunks Do The Dew Sale with a Mountain Dew theme to go along with his Mountain Dew Green Label Art tundra bottle. The fading between the 2 shades of Green is mint, and the splatter effect on the back gives Do The Dew Dunks Green a nice little touch that you may not notice at first. One of the sneakers says ‘Do The Dew’ and the other sneaker says ‘Dunk The Dew’ and both are done in a stylish graffiti font.

Nike Dunk High SB Heaven Gate Sample

Nike Dunk High SB Heaven Gate Sample

Remember the Nike Dunk High SB Heaven Gate that was suppose drop this Fall? They were set to drop in August to be exact, but they were replaced by the unFutura SB Dunk Hi. The news first hit the web about the Heaven Gate Nike Dunk in December 2007 after we posted our exclusive interview with Todd Jordan. Mr. Jordan told us about the HG Nike Dunks in the interview, but he said too much. At the time we had no idea Todd was talking about the religious cult “Heaven’s Gate” that was led by Marshall Applewhite and Bonnie Nettles. The cult resulted in 38 dead bodies that was found in a mansion in San Diego, CA on March 26, 1997.

The controversy surrounding the “Heaven’s Gate” Custom Nike Dunk High SB has forced Nike to scrap the Dunk Highs which were scheduled to be this Fall. The name Custom Heaven Gate Nike Dunks is in reference to the San Diego based religious cult which was led by Marshall Applewhite and Bonnie Nettles, the 39 group members ending up committing suicide wearing black t-shirts, sweat pants and brand new black and white Nike Cortezs. However, the black, purple, blue and white Dunk High SB will not be dropped and have popped up on the ‘bay!.

Nike SB Dunk Mid Beijing - Triumvir x Fly

Nike SB Dunk Mid Beijing - Triumvir x Fly
For the first time in the lifespan of Triumvir, Brian and I were given a chance and a concept by an outside source (Nike) to design a shoe. The inspiration and concept of the shoe was based on “a Beijing native’s perspective of their own city, with the slogan skate towards Tienanmen Square.” The Nike SB Dunk Mid is going to be a special edition for fly’s Beijing shop and the first Nike Shoe ever to be named after China’s great northern metropolis, “Beijing.” We were asked to incorporate the following categories of what Beijing is known for into the design of the shoe: dust, traffic, highways, noodles, Tienanmen Square, and the capital of China. Below are a few pictures of the design phase that we sent to Nike and the actual Nike SB Dunk Mid Beijing - Triumvir x Fly shoes we received.

This was one of the drafts Brian and I came up with during our two days of lockup. Many drafts didn’t make it… I’ll probably show a few of those drafts later on - maybe. As you can see by the pictures, we had to represent every element given to us for the design of the shoe. The toughest part was to fuse the highway and noodle concept into the shoe.

This was the final draft of the Beijing Dunk Mid that was approved by Nike. As for the highway and noodle concept we decided to use a cad style design. The pattern on the heel and lace panel is an aerial view of the Beijing highway and since noodles are messy and intertwined, we went ahead with a repeated pattern to represent the effect. It’s funny that I used to use the same template to design my customs…

The Beijing Nike Dunks Mid was chosen to represent Beijing because Jeff loves to skate in Dunk Mids. We suggested using premium tumbled leather for the black panels. The gray tones were used to symbolize the colors of the city’s high-rises and highways.

On our first rough draft we included the allergy mask concept that is commonly worn by the Beijing people during its sandstorm seasons. We chose to use white on the front toe panel and on the laces to illustrate the allergy mask.

Beijing has a rich history and has been the capital of China for many centuries now, so to find a balance between it’s past and present we used red and gold on the shoe. Red and gold symbolize fortune and prosperity in Chinese culture; the colors also reflect that of the Chinese flag.

We needed to fuse the slogan “skate towards Tienanmen square” into the shoe. So we went with a traditional Chinese seal used to prove identity on documents, contracts, art; these seals were also used by imperial families of the past. The Chinese characters we used in this stamp are a more archaic form of the Chinese characters we see in the present day.

Nike Dunk SB Mid Premium - TV Cappuccino Silver

Nike Dunk SB Mid Premium - TV Cappuccino Silver

We finally have a good look at the Nike SB Dunk Mid Premium - TV. They are inspired by the television set, with the most noticeable feature of this inspiration seen on the insole, which is decorated with pixel boxes and and colorful designs. They feature a cappuccino / silver upper constructed from suede along with textured material on the side panels and toe box.

You might not immediately realize it by looking at them, but a look at the insole reveals that these Nike Dunks are inspired by the almighty boob tube. The insole is decorated with pixel boxes and the rainbow striped no-signal bars that appeared on old television sets. The outer part of the shoe looks pretty basic, with a suede cappuccino/silver upper accented by a textured material on the side panel and toebox and a silver Swoosh.

At the end of 2008, this Nike SB Dunk Mid Premium appeared with reports claiming that it inspired by TVs. At first glance it is hard to find the connection between this Nike TV Dunk SB and the cappuccino and silver color scheme with a television, but it isn’t until you see insole which bares graphics of pixels. Aside from the combination of cappuccino and a more grey than silver palette, this Nike Dunks TV also consists of griptape-like material on the toe box and side panel as well as premium materials including suede and leather. No word on when these will be available stateside, but they have dropped overseas.

Nike SB Dunks Mid - Aqua Blue

Nike SB Dunks Mid - Aqua Blue

We just got a look at the “aqua fuel” colorway of the Nike SB Dunks Mid Aqua Blue, which wasn’ t the best colorway. This classic Nike Dunks Aqua Blue comes in a white/black/aqua fuel colorway. This colorway of the nike sb aqua fuel will certainly turn some heads during the hot summer days. The sneakers base is made of cool aqua fuel leather, while black appears on the underlay and shoes lace, which features a cool and unique design. Aqua fuel is seen on the contrast stitching, outsole, ankle strap, tip and the nike swoosh. The sneaker also features a cool black midsole. What do you think?

Do you know something about the Nike SB Dunk Mid? Okay let me tell you some interesting story about this shoe. In 2004, the kick coming out for the first time, but because of its strange colorway and the odd shape make public do not quite acceptable. Several years later, it came back again as the member of Nike Dunks SB packup. Because of its added strap, the mid quickly choose by the SKATE in their SBs package. The shoes feature with better ankle support and partner the higher rise with the strap, so it surely can keep you lively if you hold one pair.

Even till now it still is hard for you to find a good color in the “Three Bears Pack,” which including the Dunk Mid. the Nike SB Aqua Blue Shoes will suppose to come in next month, but it sure is sold out in no time.
